meanings.definition: Relating to the study of bird eggs.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted an oologic research project on different bird eggs.
meanings.sent2: Her oologic expertise helped identify the species of the bird based on its egg.
meanings.sent3: The oologic enthusiast had a collection of beautifully colored bird eggs.
meanings.sent4: His oologic knowledge cracked the mystery of the rare egg found in the forest.
meanings.sent5: Studying bird eggs from an oologic perspective revealed fascinating patterns and colors.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the branch of zoology that deals with the study of bird eggs.
meanings.sent1: The oologic department at the zoo specialized in bird egg research.
meanings.sent2: She attended a conference on oologic studies in zoos around the world.
meanings.sent3: The oologic exhibit at the museum showcased various bird egg specimens.
meanings.sent4: In the oologic field, researchers work to protect endangered bird species.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the oologic aspects of zoology opened up a whole new world of discovery.
